name: Griffon Malice
flavor: At the start of any griffon's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The griffon flies up to their speed, and can make a free strike against each creature who makes an opportunity attack against them during this movement.
A griffon acting this turn unleashes a hideous screech at one enemy within 5 squares of them, forcing that creature to make an **Intuition test**.

Winds bluster and blow across the encounter map. Until the end of the encounter, each creature who can't fly or isn't mounted on a flying creature takes a âˆ’3 penalty to stability, and any forced movement effect targeting such a creature moves them an additional 5 squares.
